ANNOUNCE: COMUnit 1.1 is now available for download at
http://comunit.sourc=
eforge.net

COMUnit is a Visual Basic port of the JUnit unit testing framew=
ork that
is designed to facilitate developing unit tests for Microsoft COM
=
components.  COMUnit 1.1 is a production/stable version that has been
and i=
s actively being used for unit testing enterprise C++ and VB COM
components=
.  COMUnit has already been used in a number of Extreme
Programming project=
s and is well-suited to Test first design.

New in Version 1.1:
- includes =
and installs Visual Studio templates making it quick and
simple to create n=
ew COMUnit test projects, UnitRunner forms or
TestContainer classes.
- incl=
udes the COMUnit Trace ActiveX control allowing easy tracing
within COMUnit=
 tests.  This is especially helpful for tracing the
progress of long accept=
ance tests that may have many asserts.
- includes an installation program m=
aking it simple to register COMUnit
components and install the Visual Studi=
o templates.

Features:
- test the public methods of any COM component inte=
rface that implements
IUnknown
- develop unit tests in any language that su=
pports COM interfaces 
- all unit test code can be maintained in a single V=
isual Studio
project. No need to build an extra DLL to hold test code. 
- n=
o need to build explicit TestSuites. Tests can be selected from the
TestRun=
ner user interface. 
- the framework is simple to learn consisting of only =
3 interfaces and 5
classes. 
- all code is available as open source under t=
he GNU Lesser General
Public License (LGPL) 
- test runners are available a=
s ActiveX controls that can be easily
extended and can be modularly added t=
o test forms 
- well suited to XP Test first Design. 

any questions, comme=
nts or suggestions, feel free to send me an email or
post a message on the =
COMUnit user's mailing list
(mailto:comunit-users@...)
ch=
eers,
owen.
